* DOCSIS 3.0 24x8 (1029/206 Mbps)<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=24 |up_c=8 }}
===Likely compatible services=== Cable provider [http://static.tp-link.com/TC7650_ISP_Certification_List.pdf compatibility list] (as of 06/19/2017): *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ''Xfinity'' *{{Approved by service|Spectrum}} :*{{Approved by service|Charter}} :*{{Approved by service|Time Warner}} ''Cable'' :*{{Approved by service|Brighthouse}} ''Networks'' <!-- *{{Approved by service|Suddenlink}} *{{Approved by service|Mediacom}} *{{Approved by service|WOW}} *{{Approved by service|Liberty Cablevision}} ''of Puerto Rico'' --> Under certification process: *{{Approved by service|Cox}} ''Cable''
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r31535883-HSI-24x8-TP-Link-7650-7650-E-Cable-Modem-Results-so-far ''24x8 TP-Link 7650/7650-E Cable Modem'' on '''DSL Reports''' forums] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM3384DU (@1GHz?) + BCM3184 (Tuner) *[http://forum.netduma.com/topic/20681-best-gaming-modems/page-5#entry151624 ''TP-Link Cable Modem'' on '''Netduma''' forums] :*[[TP-LINK TC-7610]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM3383D + BCM3413 ::8x4 Modem (343Mbps download and 143Mbps upload) :*[[TP-LINK TC-7620]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM33843D + BCM3413 ::16x4 Modem (680Mbps downstream and 143Mbps upstream) :*[[TP-LINK TC7650]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM3384DU + BCM3184 + BGU7045 ::24x8 Modem (1029Mbps downstream and 206Mbps upstream)
===See also=== *[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]]
